name: Time Oriented Report
query:
select pa.patient, pa.patient_name, pa.creation as app_created, vs.creation as vital_created, vs.modified as vital_submitted, 
min(ver.modified) as enc_patient,  max(ver.modified) as enc_finalized, npc.creation as Card_Taken
from `tabPatient Appointment`pa  inner join `tabVital Signs` vs on pa.name = vs.appointment
inner join `tabPatient Encounter` pe on pe.appointment = pa.name
inner join `tabVersion` ver on pe.name = ver.docname  
left join `tabNHIF Patient Claim` npc on pe.appointment = npc.patient_appointment
group by pa.creation order by pa.creation;

roles.role: Insurance Head and NHIF Patient Claim
